BREAKPOINT:

Hello World

This prototype is version 12 with css/sub-menu_08.css. (embedded). Key classes are LI class submenu, which replaces the Bootstrap dropdown class; and a UL UL class submenu-menu.

The purpose is to create a Bootstrap Dropdown menu that open to a sub-menu in desktop views.

I need help to integrate this prototype and target it elements in a WordPress theme using the Navwalker plugin.
